decisions.title: Use JSON for state tracking
decisions.context: Anthropic recommends JSON over Markdown for state tracking - models are less likely to inappropriately modify JSON files
decisions.decision: Use single state.json file instead of multiple Markdown files (progress.md, current-task.md, decisions.md, features.json)

decisions.title: Merge code-agent and test-agent into dev-agent
decisions.context: TDD workflow naturally combines test writing and code implementation. Anthropic uses single coding agent.
decisions.decision: Create unified dev-agent that handles full TDD cycle: RED -> GREEN -> REFACTOR -> COMMIT

decisions.title: Reduce commands from 9 to 4
decisions.context: 9 slash commands create cognitive overhead. Many commands have overlapping functionality.
